RainbruRPG::Server::ServerConfiguration

RainbruRPG::Server::ServerConfiguration Class Reference

#include <serverconfiguration.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Server::ServerConfiguration:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The data needed for the configuration of the server.

The server can accept only several types of connection. The playMode status is used by the players. The editMode is the mode used to connect the editor and the floodMode is used by the netflooder.

The ConfigDialog is the GUI for modifying the values of an instance of this class.
